name: The Train Part 2
storyline:
The Greyhound makes its second grand trip!

Word has spread around the island that The Greyhound is back in service, and a new set of tracks has been laid to the sprawling metropolis of New Bromdal! Join Eve and her grandad as they set off on a new adventure to the big city!

Leave romanticised village life behind and travel to a world of skyscrapers, traffic jams, and (of course) urban silliness!

New friends await them, and with new friends come new challenges, but Eve is always happy to lend a hand whenever she can. What could possibly go wrong in such a perfect city?

Will Eve find the confusing world of tarmac and steel inviting? How will her grandad react to such a change of environment? These are important questions that only they will find the answers for.
summary: The Train Part 2 is a sequel to GnomeKing Games's first Game Boy title, The Train. It picks up immediately after where The Train ended, taking Eve and her grandad to a megacity called New Bromdal.
